item.description:
Planning to do a half mile warm up then speed work consisting of 6 x 400's at 1:48 per lap which is a 7:15 pace with a walking recovery lap between speed laps.

I have plenty of pace bands for those that would like to work faster or slower. The link below has a nice calculator to help determine what pace you should be using. The times I am using are based on my 5k speed but I have never been able to reach what the calculator says I should do at Half or Marathon level.

http://www.runningfor...
item.how_to_find_us: Should be easy to spot people hanging around inside the track area.
item.name: North Haven Track
